TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl
Public MustInherit Class WebZone Inherits CompositeControl

summary.span: 做為在 Web 組件應用程式中當做伺服器控制項容器之所有控制項 (包括 Web 組件 控制項、伺服器控制項和使用者控制項) 的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all controls that act as containers for server controls (including Web Parts controls, server controls, and user controls) in Web Parts applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件區域是定義的區域，包含伺服器控制項在網頁上，並提供一致的使用者介面 (UI)、 配置和轉譯為包含的控制項。A Web Parts zone is a defined region that contains server controls on a Web page, and provides a consistent user interface (UI), layout, and rendering for the contained controls. 區域會呈現在瀏覽器中，以 HTML 表格。Zones are rendered in a browser as HTML tables. 類別是所有的 Web 組件區域的基底類別。The class is the base class for all Web Parts zones. 區域控制項是複合控制項，設計成包含其他控制項，因此類別繼承自類別。A zone control is a composite control designed to contain other controls, hence the class inherits from the class. 搭配控制項和控制項 （或可以放在區域中其他使用者或伺服器控制項），區域控制項衍生自基底類別會構成基本建置組塊的 Web 組件應用程式。Together with the control and controls (or other user or server controls that can be placed in zones), zone controls derived from the base class form the essential building blocks of a Web Parts application. 若要啟用完整的 Web 組件功能，其所包含的控制項是重要的角色的 Web 組件區域。A critical role of Web Parts zones is to enable full Web Parts functionality for the controls they contain. 每個 Web 組件頁面包含至少一個區域，而且區域可以包含零個或多個組件控制項。Every Web Parts page contains at least one zone, and a zone can contain zero or more part controls. 需要 Web 組件功能區域。Zones are required for Web Parts functionality. 沒有區域，甚至是衍生自控制項類別可以有極少的 Web 組件功能。Without zones, even controls that derive from the class can have very little Web Parts functionality. 相反地，Web 組件控制項集合的設計，因為您可以放置一般 ASP.NET 控制項、 伺服器控制項或使用者控制項，載入區域 (衍生自)，並藉由在該區域，這些一般的伺服器控制項是做為啟用控制項在執行階段。Conversely, because of the design of the Web Parts control set, you can place ordinary ASP.NET controls, server controls, or user controls into a zone (which derives from ), and by virtue of being in the zone, these ordinary server controls are enable to act as controls at run time. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件類別。For details, see the documentation for the class. > [!NOTE] > 您可新增或頁面以外的區域，但在此情況下，只是功能就如同一般的伺服器控制項的控制項。It is possible to add or controls to a page outside of a zone, but in that case they simply function as ordinary server controls. 有兩大類別的區域中 Web 組件控制項的集合，全部都是繼承自基底類別。There are two broad categories of zones in the Web Parts control set, all of which inherit from the base class. - 區域。 zones. 這些包含（和其他伺服器和使用者） 控制項，並形成大部分的情況與使用者互動的主要 UI 的 Web 組件頁面。These contain (and other server and user) controls, and form the primary UI of Web Parts pages that users interact with most of the time. - 區域。 zones. 這些區域提供的 Web 組件頁面的特殊檢視，讓使用者修改 （個人化） 內容、 配置、 外觀、 行為以及控制項中所包含的屬性Web 組件頁面上的區域。These zones provide special views of a Web Parts page that enable users to modify (personalize) the content, layout, appearance, behavior, and properties of controls contained in zones on a Web Parts page. 例如，區域是提供 頁面上，讓使用者可以加入和移除伺服器控制項的目錄檢視。For example, a zone is a that provides a catalog view of a page, enabling users to add and remove server controls. 區域是另一種，提供一種編輯檢視的頁面上，讓使用者能夠修改並編輯頁面，以及屬性、 外觀和行為的控制項的配置。An zone is another type of that provides an editing view of a page, enabling users to modify and edit the layout of the page, along with the properties, appearance, and behavior of the controls. 每個區域中 Web 組件控制集設計成包含對應的一種控制項衍生自類別，做為區域的主要內容與主要 UI 組件控制項。Each zone in the Web Parts control set is designed to contain a corresponding type of control derived from the class, with the part controls serving as the main content and primary UI of the zone. 下表中，會顯示 Web 組件控制集，以及對應的類型及其包含的組件控制項的區域類型。Zone types in the Web Parts control set, along with the corresponding types of part controls they contain, are shown in the following table. |組件控制項類型Part control type|區域類型Zone type| |-----------------------|---------------| | (和伺服器和使用者控制項，會包裝與在執行階段) (and server and user controls, which are wrapped with a at run time)| (基底類別是) (the base class is )| | (數個衍生的控制項提供自訂 Web 組件控制項集合，與可以開發控制項) (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom controls can be developed)| (基底類別是) (the base class is )| | (數個衍生的控制項提供自訂 Web 組件控制項集合，與可以開發控制項) (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom controls can be developed)| (基底類別是) (the base class is )| | （連接控制項都是唯一，因為不是繼承自基底類別的組件控制項） (connection controls are unique in that they are not part controls that inherit from the base class)| (直接繼承自) (inherits directly from )| 中的 Web 組件控制項的所有區域都有基本、 一般使用者介面項目，它們繼承自基底類別。All zones in the Web Parts control have basic, common user interface elements that they inherit from the base class. 並非所有這些項目會顯示在每個區域中，但每個區域的類型是能夠使這些常見的區域相關 UI 項目下, 表中所述。Not all these elements are visible on every zone, but each zone type is capable of having these common, zone-related UI elements, as described in the following table. |區域一節Zone section|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |頁首Header|區域前一節。The top section of a zone. 它包含標頭文字，其中可以包括的標題區域中。區分標頭的樣式屬性 （例如框線或背景的色彩）區域層級 （由按鈕、 超連結或影像） 的動詞命令的使用者可以按一下來執行將套用至整個區域，例如關閉區域的 UI 動作。It includes header text, which can include a title for the zone; style attributes (such as a border or background color) that distinguish the header; and zone-level verbs (represented by buttons, hyperlinks, or images) that users can click to perform UI actions that apply to the entire zone, such as closing a zone. 數個屬性，例如， ，和，與相關標題區域的區域。Several properties, such as , , and , relate to the header area of a zone. 如果在區域中，有區域層次動詞和屬性會套用至它們。If there are zone-level verbs in the zone, the and properties apply to them. 請注意，這些兩個動詞屬性會套用至區域層次動詞命令，不必在個別組件所包含之控制項的區域中的動詞命令。Note that these two verb properties apply to zone-level verbs only, not to verbs in the individual part controls contained in the zone. 標頭不會出現在每一種區域中。在通常會出現區域沒有需要具有一般的頁首區域文字與動詞，例如關閉動詞命令。Headers are not present in every type of zone; typically they appear in zones where there is a need to have a common header area with text and a verb, such as a close verb.| |本文Body|主要內容區域的區段。The main contents section of a zone. 衍生自每個區域具有一個主體 區段。Every zone that derives from has a body section. 所有類型的區域中 Web 組件控制項集合，該區域的主體包含指定的型別控制項 （或其他伺服器控制項），對應至區域類型，如上表所示。For all types of zones in the Web Parts control set, the body of the zone contains the designated type of controls (or other server controls) that correspond to a zone type, as indicated in the previous table. 中的各個成員類別會影響內容的 [主體] 區段中，這類， ， ，和屬性。Various members of the class affect the contents of the body section, such as the , , , and properties. [主體] 區段是空的如果可以在某些情況下顯示訊息。If the body section is empty, the message can be displayed in certain situations.| |ChromeChrome|常見 UI 項目呈現區域中的每個組件控制項。The common UI elements rendered for each part control in a zone. 這是不同的樣式屬性套用至區域本身; 的討論chrome 特別適用於包含的組件控制項。This is distinct from a discussion of style attributes that apply to the zone itself; chrome applies specifically to the contained part controls. Chrome 包含動詞命令、 框線和背景色彩或字型樣式的區域的組件控制項的標題文字，例如其他樣式屬性。Chrome includes verbs, borders, and other style attributes such as background color, or font style of the title text, for a zone's part controls. 區域使用單一的 chrome 物件適用於它所包含的組件控制項的類型決定 chrome 詳細資料 (例如物件包含控制項)。A zone determines the chrome details by using a single chrome object appropriate to the type of part controls it contains (for example, a object for a that contains controls). Chrome 詳細資料和區域中的所有組件控制項轉譯，則會處理此單一 chrome 物件。This single chrome object handles the chrome details and the rendering for all the part controls in the zone. 這可讓開發人員建立可在其中指定了一致、 一般外觀及操作的所有組件控制項的區域。This enables developers to create zones in which they can specify a consistent, common look and feel for all the part controls. 某些屬性區域的組件控制項包括 chrome 與相關， ， ，和屬性。Some properties that relate to the chrome for a zone's part controls include the , , , and properties. 請注意最 chrome 相關的屬性，包括特定的屬性來參考特定類型的區域，chrome 物件基底中不會實作類別。Note that most chrome-related properties, including a specific property to reference the chrome object for a particular type of zone, are not implemented in the base class. 相反地，大部分的 chrome 特定功能的區域會視其組件控制項的獨特需求的特定區域類型上實作。Instead, most chrome-specific features of zones are implemented on specific zone types as appropriate to the unique needs of their part controls. 請參閱本主題的上一個資料表中所列每個區域類型的主題。See the topics for each zone type listed in the previous table of this topic.| |組件控制項Part Controls|位於區域的主體區段中的控制項。The controls that reside in the body section of a zone. 繼承自每個區域類別包含一或多個組件控制項，在對應的輸入，其主體區段中，本主題中上表所示。Every zone that inherits from the class contains in its body section one or more part controls of a corresponding type, as shown in the previous table in this topic. 這些組件控制項形成主要 UI 的 Web 組件應用程式。These part controls form the main UI of Web Parts applications. 最區域類型是衍生自具有集合屬性，讓他們參考所有其包含的組件控制項，例如屬性上的類別，而屬性類別。Most zone types that derive from have a collection property that enables them to reference all their contained part controls, such as the property on the class, and the property on the class.| |頁尾Footer|區域的底部區段。The bottom section of a zone. 標頭 區段中，例如它不存在於每個類型的區域，但通常會發生在區域。Like the header section, it is not present in every type of zone, but usually occurs in zones. 頁尾區段的一般內容是的 ok 動詞或套用動詞命令，例如，出現在頁尾中的動詞區域。Typical contents of a footer section are verbs such as an ok verb or an apply verb, which appear in the footer of zones. 包含一些與頁尾區段的屬性， ， ，和屬性。Some properties that relate to the footer section include the , , , and properties.| 大部分的類別的內容會討論在上表中描述的區域通用的 UI 項目。Most of the class's properties are discussed in the preceding table that describes the common UI elements of zones. 類別也有其呈現內容的角色與相關的數種方法。The class also has several methods relating to its role of rendering content. ， ， ，和方法可以全部覆寫，以程式設計方式控制區域的每個特定區段的呈現。The , , , and methods can all be overridden to provide programmatic control over the rendering of each specific section of a zone. 例如，如果您想要自訂的目錄中的區域應用程式的所有頁尾區段轉譯，您無法繼承自類別中覆寫方法繼承自，並將變更轉譯頁尾區段。For example, if you want to customize the rendering of all the footer sections of catalog zones in your application, you could inherit from the class, override the method inherited from , and change the rendering of the footer section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分會顯示兩個自訂控制項衍生自類別。The first part of the code example shows two custom controls that derive from the class. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說：開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_Zone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/CS/zonewebparts.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Zone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/VB/zonewebparts.vb#2)] 在程式碼範例的第二部分顯示的 Web 網頁主控控制項。The second part of the code example shows a Web page that hosts the controls. 請注意，宣告式標記包含兩個控制項控制項和控制項。Notice that the declarative markup contains two controls, a control and an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/CS/zoneoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/VB/zoneoverviewvb.aspx#1)] 您可以在載入網頁瀏覽器，並在不同的網頁顯示模式，以查看不同的區域的行為方式的參數中。You can load the page in a browser and switch among the various page display modes to see how the different zones behave. 如需有關顯示模式，以便在它們之間切換可讓使用者的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：變更顯示模式，在 Web 組件頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

para.span: 您很少需要直接繼承自類別以開發自訂的 Web 組件區域。

span.span: You rarely need to inherit directly from the class to develop custom Web Parts zones.

para.span: Web 組件控制集包含在 < 備註 > 一節中，上面所列的特殊的區域，通常您可以衍生自其中一個自訂行為新增至區域。

span.span: The Web Parts control set contains the specialized zones listed above in the Remarks section, and usually you can derive from one of them to add custom behavior to a zone.

para.span: 如果您決定要直接繼承自類別，您必須覆寫的屬性和方法的數目 (請參閱文件的成員類別)。

span.span: If you do decide to inherit directly from the class, you must override a number of properties and methods (see the documentation for the members of the class).

para.span: 您也必須建立自訂控制項，選擇性地自訂控制項來建立唯一的顯示模式，在其中檢視您的區域和其他自訂項目，讓您在 Web 組件控制項集合內工作的區域。

span.span: You must also create a custom control, optionally a custom control to create a unique display mode in which to view your zone, and other customizations to make your zone work within the Web Parts control set.
Introduction to Web Parts

related.span: 概觀：Web 組件控制項集合

span.span: Overview: The Web Parts Control Set

related.span: 逐步解說：變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string BackImageUrl { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property BackImageUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BackImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BackImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定區域背景影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to a background image for a zone.

value.span: 字串，表示用做區域背景影像的影像 URL。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used as a background image for the zone.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區域的背景影像會顯示區域內容會顯示所有顯示模式。The background image for a zone is visible in all display modes in which a zone's contents are visible. 如果區域包含組件控制項，影像會顯示在控制項後面。If a zone contains part controls, the image appears behind the controls. 如果區域不包含控制項，其內容不會轉譯在瀏覽模式中，因此不會顯示映像。If a zone contains no controls, its contents are not rendered in browse mode, so the image is not displayed. 如果提供的映像較小的區域內文項目，它會並排顯示以涵蓋完整的主體區域。If the supplied image is smaller than the body of a zone, it is tiled to cover the full body area. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，有兩個區域中，第二個宣告式標記，``項目為空白。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl/CS/zonebackimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl/VB/zonebackimageurlvb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器中，您可以切換到設計模式，以查看映像中的空白區域。In a browser, you can switch to design mode to see the image in the empty zone. 請注意，實際的 URL，如在此範例中並未提供的屬性。Note that an actual URL for the property is not provided in this example. 如需如何變更頁面的詳細資料顯示模式，請參閱 [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string EmptyZoneText { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property EmptyZoneText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ EmptyZoneText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EmptyZoneText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定區域不包含控制項時出現的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.

value.span: 字串，包含空白區域中出現的訊息。

span.span: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.

value.span: 預設的特定文化特性字串是由 .NET Framework 所提供。

span.span: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的文字沒有控制項可以在區域中，且區域必須是其中一個的個人化模式，例如編輯、 設計或目錄模式時，會出現屬性。The text in the property appears when there are no controls in a zone, and the zone is in one of the personalization modes, such as edit, design, or catalog mode. > [!NOTE] > 當區域可進入其中一個允許對區域的內容所做的個人化變更的個人化模式控制集屬性值，以`true`參考其中的顯示模式物件屬性。When a zone enters one of the personalization modes that would allow personalization changes to be made to the zone's contents, the control sets the property value to `true` on the display mode object referenced in its property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，有兩個區域中，第二個宣告式標記，``項目為空白。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText/CS/zoneemptyzonetextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText/VB/zoneemptyzonetextvb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器中，您可以切換至設計模式，請參閱提供的文字空區域中顯示的屬性。In a browser, you can switch to design mode to see the text supplied for the property displayed in the empty zone. 如需如何變更頁面的詳細資料顯示模式，請參閱 [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，.NET Framework 無法載入或建立的執行個體是否控制項的執行個體類別會建立並顯示在其位置。At run time, if the .NET Framework is unable to load or create an instance of a control, an instance of the class is created and displayed in its place. 此物件包含錯誤訊息，並從的樣式屬性屬性會套用至錯誤訊息。This object contains an error message, and the style attributes from the property are applied to the error message.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property HasFooter As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool HasFooter { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示區域是否具有頁尾區。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.

value.span: 如果區域有頁尾區，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性主要由控制項開發人員建立自訂的區域。The property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones. 它會存在隨旗標，讓 Web 組件控制集轉譯的頁尾，只在適當區域時。It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a footer only when appropriate for a zone. 例如，屬性會覆寫這個屬性，並傳回`false`，如此一來，頁尾不會呈現為控制項。For example, the property overrides this property and returns `false`, so that a footer is not rendered for a control. 工具區域 (區域間接衍生自藉由類別類別，例如和) 必須具有頁尾，如此一來，比方說，它們可以轉譯具有按鈕的一般使用者介面 (UI) 動詞命令這類 **[確定]**，**套用**，並**取消**底部的區域。Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the class by means of the class, such as and ) must have footers so that, for example, they can render common user interface (UI) verbs with buttons such as **OK**, **Apply**, and **Cancel** at the bottom of the zone. 因為屬性是`true`根據預設，工具區域不需要覆寫的屬性。Because the property is `true` by default, tool zones do not need to override the property.

para.span: 如果您要建立自訂的工具區域衍生自，您可以覆寫方法，並提供您區域的頁尾的呈現。

span.span: If you are creating a custom tool zone that derives from , you can override the method and provide rendering for your zone's footer.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property HasHeader As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool HasHeader { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示區域是否具有頁首區。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.

value.span: 如果區域有頁首區，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the zone has a header area; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性主要由控制項開發人員建立自訂的區域。The property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones. 它做旗標，讓 Web 組件控制集呈現只在適當區域時，標頭存在。It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a header only when appropriate for a zone. 例如，屬性會覆寫這個屬性，並傳回`false`除非頁面是其中一種模式，可讓個人化。For example, the property overrides this property and returns `false` unless the page is in one of the modes that allow personalization. 在這種情況下，在瀏覽模式下不為控件呈現標題，而在大多數其他模式中，呈現標題。In this case, a header is not rendered for a control in browse mode, while in most other modes a header is rendered. 如需有關顯示模式，以便在它們之間切換可讓使用者的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：變更顯示模式，在 Web 組件頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 工具區域 (區域間接衍生自藉由類別類別，例如和) 必須顯示只有當頁面處於適當的顯示模式的標頭。Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the class by means of the class, such as and ) must have headers that appear only when the page is in the appropriate display mode. 因為屬性是`true`根據預設，它們不需要覆寫的屬性。Because the property is `true` by default, they do not need to override the property.

para.span: 如果您要建立自訂的工具區域衍生自，您可以覆寫方法，並提供您區域的標頭的轉譯。

span.span: If you are creating a custom tool zone that derives from , you can override the method and provide rendering for your zone's header.

related.span: 逐步解說：變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區域的內容網頁進入特定顯示模式時，會顯示屬性。The contents of a zone's property are displayed when a Web page enters certain display modes. 例如，在頁面，其中包含控制項，指派給文字屬性變成可見，當頁面進入編輯、 類別目錄或設計模式。For example, on a page that has a control, the text assigned to the property becomes visible when the page enters edit, catalog, or design mode. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，有兩個區域中，第二個宣告式標記，``項目為空白。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_HeaderText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_HeaderText/CS/zoneheadertextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_HeaderText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_HeaderText/VB/zoneheadertextvb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器中，您可以將網頁切換至設計模式，請參閱提供的文字標題區域的區域中顯示的屬性。In a browser, you can switch the page to design mode to see the text supplied for the property displayed in the header area of the zone. 如需如何變更頁面的詳細資料顯示模式，請參閱 [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object)

span.span: The previously saved state.

summary.span: 載入先前儲存的區域狀態資訊。

span.span: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法載入先前儲存的區域的狀態資訊。The method loads previously saved state information for a zone. 它會覆寫基底方法為也載入狀態資訊的各種不同的樣式屬性的區域，例如， ，和。It overrides the base method to also load state information for the various style properties of a zone, such as , , and .

exception.span: 物件的大小不等於目前檢視狀態物件的大小。

span.span: The size of the object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法，以防止區域呈現其父控制項是否另一個區域或組件控制項。The method overrides the base method in order to prevent a zone from rendering if its parent control is another zone or a part control.

span.span: A control is nested within another zone or within a control.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的內容與此控制項的框線之間的距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the contents of a control and the border of the control.

value.span: 物件，表示度量類型和邊框距離量。

span.span: A object that indicates the type of measurement and the amount of padding.

span.span: The default padding for a zone is 5 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可以用於定義每個控制項的內容和區域所包含的所有控制項的框線之間的標準的填補量。Use this property to define a standard padding amount between the content of each control and its border for all controls contained in a zone.

exception.span: 指派給屬性的值為負數。

span.span: The value assigned to the property is a negative number.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PartChromeStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ PartChromeStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得樣式特性，該樣式特性套用至區域中 Web 組件控制項的框線。

span.span: Gets style characteristics that apply to the borders of Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

value.span: ，包含區域中 Web 組件控制項框線的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the borders that surround Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項可以有自己的框線，定義於屬性。A Web Parts control can have its own border, defined in the property. 包含控制項的區域可以新增其他控制項周圍外部框線。The zone that contains the control can add an additional outer border around the control. 取決於其外部框線的區域可以放著它的 Web 組件控制項中每一個屬性。The outer border that a zone can place around each of its Web Parts controls is determined by the property. 這個屬性並不會出屬性的屬性包含在取消物件; 它是與合併，還是新增至它們。This property does not cancel out the property attributes contained in the object; it is merged with or added to them. 它可讓每個 Web 組件控制項，其中包含提供通用且一致的框線區域。It enables a zone to provide a common and consistent border for each of the Web Parts controls it contains. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然主要是為了如果您在設定其他屬性，將可以設定、 包含的控制項周圍的區域其外部框線的樣式設定適用於這類的屬性中，所參考的物件，瀏覽器會解譯為用來呈現區域的資料表的所有子項目套用這些樣式屬性。Although the style settings apply primarily to the outer border that a zone can set around the controls it contains, if you set additional properties on the object referenced by the property, such as , the browser interprets those style attributes as applying to all the sub-elements of the table used to render a zone. 因此，設定屬性所參考的樣式物件屬性具有相同的效果控制項設定為屬性所參考的物件上屬性。Hence, setting the property for the style object referenced by the property has the same effect on a control as setting the property on the object referenced by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性來設定區域中 Web 組件控制項外框線的樣式屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to set style attributes for the outer borders of Web Parts controls contained in a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle/CS/zonepartchromestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle/VB/zonepartchromestylevb.aspx#1)] 請注意，當您第一次載入瀏覽器中的上的控制項具有自己綠色的框線寬度為 2 個像素為單位，在網頁的宣告式標記中所設定。Note that when you first load the page in a browser, the upper control has its own green border with a width of 2 pixels, as set in the declarative markup for the page. 使用者按一下行事曆之後，頁面以程式設計方式變成紅色，這兩個區域中控制項的框線，並將其框線寬度設定為 4 個像素，但上方的控制項會保留其原始的綠色內部框線。After a user clicks the calendar, the page programmatically changes the borders of both controls in the zone to red, and sets their border width to 4 pixels, yet the upper control retains its original green inner border.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property PartChromeType As PartChromeType

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType PartChromeType { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定區域中架構 Web 組件控制項的框線類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

value.span: ，決定區域中架構 Web 組件控制項的框線類型。

span.span: A that determines the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性其作用就像區域中的 Web 組件控制項的預設屬性。The property acts like a default property for the Web Parts controls in a zone. 如果 Web 組件控制項及其設定屬性，屬性會覆寫的效果在執行階段的屬性。If a Web Parts control has its property set, that property overrides the effect of the property at run time. 如果控制項的屬性未設定，或設為，值屬性會決定哪種框線控制項有。If the control's property is not set, or is set to , the value of the property determines what kind of border the control has.

exception.span: 該值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value is not one of the values.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PartStyle As TableStyle
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle ^ PartStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得樣式特性，該樣式特性套用至區域中每個 Web 組件控制項的框線和內容。

span.span: Gets style characteristics that apply to the border and contents of each Web Parts control contained by a zone.

value.span: ，包含區域中 Web 組件控制項的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the Web Parts controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 樣式屬性套用至的框線與內容的每個區域中的 Web 組件控制項。The style attributes apply to the border and contents of every Web Parts control in a zone. 這個屬性是唯讀的;不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性物件傳回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 這個屬性可讓您在區域包含的所有控制項的內容提供一致的樣式。This property enables you to provide a consistent style for the contents of all the controls a zone contains. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，在區域中的宣告式標記中所參考，則``項目和``項目，因為它們是在區域中，做為 Web 組件控制項在執行階段的兩個控制項。Note that in the zone referenced in the declarative markup, there is an `` element and an `` element, with both controls acting as Web Parts controls at run time because they are in a zone. 使用者按一下月曆控制項上的日期之後，此頁面以程式設計方式使用屬性，以將區域中的所有組件控制項的背景色彩變更為紅色。After the user clicks a date on the calendar control, the page programmatically uses the property to change the background color of all part controls in the zone to red. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_PartStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartStyle/CS/zonepartstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_PartStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartStyle/VB/zonepartstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 針對控制項，方法會設定區域會轉譯 HTML 表格的樣式屬性。For a control, the method sets style attributes for the HTML table that is rendered for the zone. 樣式屬性協助呈現 HTML 表格，在支援的瀏覽器中正常運作。The style attributes help render the HTML table properly in supported browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來判定該動詞命令出現在一個區域動詞命令功能表的方式。The property can be used to determine how the verbs will appear in the verbs menu of a zone. 動詞命令可顯示為按鈕、 超連結或可點選的影像。Verbs can appear as a button, a hyperlink, or a clickable image.
